title: Energy Sustainability and Gamification: Designing VR-Based MOOCs

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Science Knowledge and Understanding of Sustainability Concepts
context.additional_context: Project-based learning incorporating gamification elements via energy system simulations in a real-time interactive VR environment

learning_goals: Learners can explain five energy sustainability-related concepts with over 80% accuracy using gamification elements (badges, leaderboards, challenges).
Learners demonstrate problem-solving skills by completing an energy efficiency optimization project in a VR simulation environment with a 90% completion rate.
Learners achieve a MOOC completion rate of over 15% through gamification activities and maintain a participation score of 4 or higher (on a 5-point scale) in peer assessment systems.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
